channel.title: Blogs on Gabe Nespoli

item.title: MLB Data Description
item.description: I have had a tough time finding this information online in one place, so I thought I would amalgamate it here. Many of the descriptions come from a Fast Balls article from 2007, but there have been many variables added since then. In most cases it was obvious so I’ve spelled out a description. Variable Name Description index A unique identification number per pitch within a game.
